On Fri, 2002-11-01 at 14:40, global_explorer wrote: if i have a testcase
that has 5 test methods, does the framework 
create 1 instance of your testcase and then execute each test method 
on that instance (calling setUp/tearDown around each) .. or does it 
create an instance for each test method (5 instances in this example) 
and call a method on each instance (setUp/tearDown called once on 
each instance's method)?

also, if an assertion fails, will the tearDown run afterward?
